PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1996-19801996-12-190,  ,  ,  ,  JUS
PrecisGranting of a LEAVE OF ABSENCE, without pay, to the Hon. LOUISE ARBOUR, a Judge of the Court of Appeal of Ontario, from November 28, 1996 to August 1, 1997, in order to serve as Prosecutor of the International Tribunal for the Prosecution of Persons Responsible for Serious Violations of International Humanitarian Law Committed in the Territory of the Former Yugoslavia and the International Tribunal for Rwanda; Order in Council P.C. 1996-1813 is hereby revoked.
Attachments
